mn120:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhāya samannāgato hoti, sīlena samannāgato hoti, sutena samannāgato hoti, cāgena samannāgato hoti, paññāya samannāgato hoti. → etthantare pāṭho cck, sya1ed potthakesu
mn120:17.8: bhāsate ca tapate ca → bhāsati ca tapati ca (sya-all, km); bhāsati ca (pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn120:37.8: na katthaci upapajjatī”ti → na kuhiñci upapajjatīti (bj); na katthaci uppajjati na kuhiñci uppajjatīti (pts-vp-pli1ed); na kuhiñci upasampajja viharatīti. (mr)
